website_summaries.verdict: Durable components in a suspension training kit that should give you a good value over time.
pros: Updated, top-selling collection of gear that works well for most users
Included workout guide will help you get started
Rubber handles provide a sturdy grip
Access to the TRX app included
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum, but you get superior equipment for the cost

website_summaries.verdict: Has a full set of what you'll need to start exercising. Portable kit can be used while traveling.
pros: Setup with this kit is straightforward
Includes a suspension anchor, door anchor, and a 35-page workout guide along with the training straps
Straps are easy to adjust, so people of different sizes can use the same kit
cons: Expensive for those who don't need the full kit
Does not contain a ceiling or wall mount
Handles have a foam coating instead of rubber

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get the TRX to go kit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product but save your money and buy the TRX to go. I bought this one for my wife to use at home and bought the travel one to take with me when I travel. Both sets were exactly the same except this one has a rudimentary workout book. Even though both offer online workout guides. The included workout book is not worth the $50 difference.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Not A Knock-Off
customer_reviews.text: Have been waiting a long time for these to be affordable. I used them back when they were only available to the military and got super ripped while in the Navy. These things work. All the 1-star reviews saying these are knock-offs are lying. Had mine registered and verified with the TRX site 5 minutes after they arrived
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It really challenges you and engages your ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It really challenges you and engages your core more than any plank I could do or HIIT workout alone. The TRX is a great alternative for weights, at least for me. The only thing I would caution is to make sure you hang this on a door that closes the same direction of your pulling. Meaning if you're pulling the TRX toward you with a workout, that door should be a door that also pulls closed. It works okay on doors that open toward you, but I have better piece of mind that I'm not just relying on a thin lock bar
customer_reviews.author: PNM

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my TRX! It provides amazing workouts and doesn't take up any space. I currently have it hung on my patio cover in my backyard. Used it last night and boy am I sore today. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: RachLJ

customer_reviews.title: ... to go down to the gym to get a good work out
customer_reviews.text: No more having to go down to the gym to get a good work out. Was introduced to TRX by our trainer, who made this a large part of our workouts. We are glad we got one for home use. We are both in our mid sixtys and find TRX is one of our better workout investments.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: The second package came and I absolutely love it. I would recommend anybody who works out ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it was delivered however when I opened the package there were parts missing. I returned the item for a refund and re-ordered the product. The second package came and I absolutely love it. I would recommend anybody who works out to purchase the TRX trainer because you can take it anywhere. You will certainly get your monies worth out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find something that would allow me to get a decent workout every day of the week, including while traveling. My physical therapist suggested TRX. I didn't know anything about it, but after seeing it, I thought it was exactly what I was looking for. I'm now five weeks into the workouts and advancing in difficulty. My golf game has improved dramatically and I'm starting to see changes in my body, which makes me feel better. I've now recommended TRX to several friends. It is perfect for someone that has limited time, but wants to remain fit. And I'll never max out the physical challenge it offers.
customer_reviews.author: K Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy (6'7", 260lbs) I use these on a near-daily frequency for the last..... 2-3 years? I love them. My wife loves them. My buddies who come workout with me at home gym love them. KILLER workout potential. Especially when used in the pushup position. The straps do not show any signs of wear or abuse. the handles are still in perfect working condition. The kit is very handy as we were able to use it when we lived in an apartment and now our home with no issue at all. 100% would buy tomorrow if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Best but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have used these at my gym for years and finally bit the bullet and ordered a set for the home. These are the best strap trainers although they are a bit more expensive than copies or knockoffs, but worth it. They are the easiest to mount, the most durable and very easy to adjust. One can perform a wide variety of exercises using one's own body weight and leverage to achieve a full workout. Buy the companion mounting hardware and the laminated charts to go along with it for easy reference. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for changing up your workout but don't buy the accessories
customer_reviews.text: The physical strap product is great and gets 5 stars for sure. Is very sturdy, adjusts easily and it feels like it will last a lifetime. I supplement this strap into my freeweights workouts for a change of pace. Zero complaints here. My one complaint is for $30 extra you get their "book" and access to their app. Both of these items I feel are completely useless. The book only has a few exercises and is more of an into into the product. The app is not very robust and YouTube does a much better job of giving you a variety of workouts. Save your money and just buy the TRX by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Elmhurst

customer_reviews.title: this is the best, and I mean the best and easiest to ...
customer_reviews.text: At 64 years old, this is the best, and I mean the best and easiest to use home gym product I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Rick DiPompeo

customer_reviews.title: Love TRX! Learn how to use it & you will too!
customer_reviews.text: TRX is a “game changer”! It can look intimidating at first, but once you learn how to use it, it’s amazing for strength & flexibility. It helped me to build muscle & drop weight! I started to use it at the gym & with the pandemic, I bought my own, hung it in my cellar & am canceling gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: Jean G

customer_reviews.title: Very good equipment but not very mobile
customer_reviews.text: Excellent equipment. However, it is advertised as a go anywhere exerciser. This is not true and not accurate. You must have a very secure structure to attach the TRX bands to. Also need some really heavy bolts at the attachment point. You are not going to be able to use this in a hotel room. You need, for example, the main house support beam in you basement or a tree to attach too. If you try to use a door frame you will rip the frame out of the wall. Actually, you are quite limited as to where ther TRX can be used.
customer_reviews.author: s tracy

customer_reviews.title: The App is not Free!
customer_reviews.text: I think the TRX straps are a great product, but the language in the description of the product on Amazon is deceitful. It says to download the FREE app for 80 more workouts. That is for a two week free trial, then the app costs $39 a year.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy B

customer_reviews.title: Works every part of my body!
customer_reviews.text: I've been staying away from weights and believe that bodyweight resistance is the way to go- at least for me. Covid has kept me out of the gym and this piece of equipment more than replaces everything I was doing there. I have a ceiling mount but also bought the wall mount which I am going to install this weekend. The over-the-door anchor is really secure - I was worried that it would not. Its really easy and comfortable to use. What I really appreciate is that it's easy to travel with and use in hotels. I travel a lot for work and really don't like hotel exercise rooms.
customer_reviews.author: KAMANI

customer_reviews.title: Back rescue
customer_reviews.text: I was to the point of considering back surgery, MRI scheduled from x-ray and teledoc evaluation. What brought me to that point I was no longer able to walk more then a quarter of mile without giving my back a rest, nor stand for more then 10 minutes before having to sit down to relieve lower back pain. I am 6’3” 225 pounds an avid mountain biker, back problems don’t interfere riding. In one week 6 days of 40 minute training following youtube starter training allowed me today to be on my feet for 3 hours straight without needing to sit down. To me it is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: steve szabados

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Since I’m working from home, and all the gyms are closed. I figured that I’ll make my own personal workout area. This TRX works great and is totally accessible during any part of my day.
customer_reviews.author: audree delacruz

customer_reviews.title: TRX is the best way to mix up home workouts
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY TRX! I always loved doing TRX classes at studios and wanted to be able to do quick workouts at home with one, and now that we're stuck at home, I am so thankful to have this. I am a NASM CPT, but you don't have to be a fitness professional to learn how to use it, plus there are tons of helpful videos online with a variety of workouts to use. You can modify anything to be easier or harder so it's great for all fitness levels. I use it on my door since I live in an apt and cannot drill into the ceiling to mount. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Borders

customer_reviews.title: Strength Training
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for strength training at home, or on the go it fits nicely in my suitcase. At home I use an eye hook to attach the system to. Make sure you place the door anchor on a durable door or the anchor will cause damage to the door, safety first. The straps are easy to adjust and when in doubt youtube any exercise for proper form. The book comes with it but I find the visual of someone showing me more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Brix-n-Ivy

customer_reviews.title: NO CUTTING CORNERS ON THESE STRAPS!
customer_reviews.text: TRX is the best. I looked at knock-offs and just decided to buck up and get “the good ones.” There’s a reason why gyms and clubs have these hanging from their cages - a quality product...this one includes the “optional” door mounter thing, the free use of app for a year, and the travel bag. Can’t wait to bring and use these when we visit the islands over Christmas!! Outdoor workouts at their finest!!
customer_reviews.author: Weightress

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Great company!  So many ways to workout!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout and company! I’m a trainer and I use TRX all the time at the gym, but i never really could get it for home. Now that gyms are closed I bought it. They sent it, I opened it and the little manual was not there. I contacted the company and they went above and beyond to fix the Situation. I will always recommend this product because it’s an awesome workout, so many different ways to train and its portable, but also because this is a great company! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to use system.
customer_reviews.text: I was not interested in having to deal with multiple stretch bands, etc. My son’s coach had recommended the TRX for him, and I got to test it. With this system, you just adjust your stance to adjust the weight. I ordered it for myself, and it is excellent. Strong components. Get the base system and not the travel one. This system is still very portable and light and has steel components. Very easy to hang and use and fully adjustable to whatever door height, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Exercises For Anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas, 2018. TRX Training is not new, but I am somewhat new to it. The TRX is sturdily built, simple to operate either indoors or outdoors and you can customize the workouts to suit your needs. Bear in mind you'll not win the World's Strongest Man or Mr. Universe contest training solely with the TRX, but you can improve your strength and conditioning in short order.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Drewry

customer_reviews.title: Deceivingly Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an addition to our small home gym and it’s quickly become our favorite exercise tool! It was easy to install, we just bought the wall anchor that was recommended. And there is SO much you can do with it! I like it because it feels easy enough when I’m doing the exercises so I don’t get overly tired, but by the next day, my muscles are sore and I know I got in a good work out!
customer_reviews.author: Britney B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition To My Quarantine Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm not going back to a commercial gym till there's a vaccine (or maybe never) this 2 30 lbs. kettlebells and bodyweight calisthenics are perfect. If your hardcore powerlifter or bodybuilder this may not be your thing. But this combo will definitely do the job for mere mortals like myself. I would take away half a star only because I think they should include a x anchor if your looking for a more permanent placement with this setup since it's not exactly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Slattery Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Physical therapy and serious workouts!
customer_reviews.text: The TRX system is fantastic! You can do a full body workout with these straps or focus on a specific area. I started using them for physical therapy after having rotator cuff surgery on both shoulders. They have allowed me to easily start exercising and now after five months can start serious training with them as well. Thanks so much to the TRX team!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bost

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for working out at home
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for working out at home. I isolate literally every body part, as well as work on core and strength! I even take it outside, strap it to a tree, and workout at the beach or the park. It's built to last, and after 2 years isn't showing any signs of giving up!
customer_reviews.author: Kstrein

customer_reviews.title: EDIT -Possibly fake.... no serial number to register
customer_reviews.text: There is no product serial number on this item to register for the free 1 year of works ours via the app..... legitimate item?? EDIT - After speaking with TRX these are legitimate straps. They were produced at the beginning of Covid and did not get the serial number put on before the factory shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Zara Clark

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity for home and on the go workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great workout the 1st time I used it. It comes with an instruction book on how to set it up in home & outdoor mounting usage. The instructions for basic workout routine is simply explained so you can get used to using it. I love the full body would out I got on day 1 and every day since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym solution for home & travel
customer_reviews.text: It is well made. It comes to be used on both 6 1/2' doors and 8' doors so I can use it on either level of the house. It has a nice compact mesh carry case to throw in a suitcase .I appreciated the instruction book that came with it & the opportunity to go online and find more workouts through a code they enclosed. My son brought one last year that he like to travel with so that recommendation was good enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: Buffs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Based on some reviews, I really wasn't sure what to expect. However, this product is heavy weight and sturdy. I've been using it on my door and I feel safe doing so. I have an old hip surgery with loss of range in motion and some other issues over the past 4 years from aggravating it. This helps me get into a squat and work out my hip areas with some sturdy assistance. The fact that I can do it at home without people gauking at me while I built up my ability is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ah Mazin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After surgery, I had to do a bit of PT at home. I used TRX at my PT office, but I needed something for the off days at home. This is a great product. My son uses it for exercise, too. YouTube has videos for how to use these for various reasons. The product also comes with a book with exercises, as well.v
customer_reviews.author: LaurenH

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile product where u can have the gym at your home or outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Love the TRX and what I got. I’m a Fitness Trainer and I have some experience using a TRX and I know you could pretty much almost do anything on it (cardio, strength training, etc.). What I got was very sturdy, great quality, and versatile (e.g., has door anchor and suspension anchor). I found the “QuickStart & Workout Guide” very useful, and I was able to use the key card to have access to custom workout videos. I found the videos very interesting and informative. As a Fitness Trainer I could say this is a great equipment to have at home (especially when gyms are closed) and kudos for everything that came with the package (workout guide/access to videos).
customer_reviews.author: Lupe C.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product to help with Physical Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I love this system. I had knee surgery a few months ago and they use these at Physical Therapy. I wanted to heal faster so I bought them to continue my exercises at home. They have classes that use these at the gym we go to and I can't wait until I am healed enough to attend those.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: All Around Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: A great piece of gear to have while the gym is closed. And once it's open again, you can use it to supplement your gym sessions. Also great for just a morning (or evening) stretch. And a good break from sitting at a desk for hours. I also got the portable version (it comes with a strap that fits over a door, so you can use it anywhere). It isn't as good as having the TRX suspended from the ceiling, but it's the next best thing. Overall highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Was using TRX at my Planet Fitness and finally bought it for my home gym as well. Love this. Lots of different ways you can adapt it to your workouts. This is my favorite piece of workout equipment. It is easy to travel with and can be used on a hotel door so you can get your workout while you travel without having to track down a gym.
customer_reviews.author: Madam Atom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very skeptical and even criticized me for ordering, but I knew from attending TRX class at my local gym how well it works. I talked him into trying it and within 5 minutes he said the words ALL women love to hear- “You’re Right”
customer_reviews.author: Kristii Buttrey

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Although the system came with a mount for your door, we decided to mount our system on a outdoor beem. We felt this was sturdier and is able to take any type of weight limit. Also there was free videos online for anyone’s level of exercising.
customer_reviews.author: nani H.

customer_reviews.title: I love the TRX
customer_reviews.text: I love the TRX. It doesn't take up much space and it's so versatile. We added it to our home gym and I'm so glad we did. You can find exercises online or on Instagram or you could go to a couple of classes for ideas on how to use it. I love that I can challenge myself on different levels with this system. It really engages my core and makes me feel so much stronger in general. I would definitely recommend this TRX system.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Best suspension trainer you can buy
customer_reviews.text: The original TRX is the best suspension trainer you can buy due to its great quality. I've read all the reviews and I've never experienced any of the quality issues others have seen and I've used these for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Tysonbrody

customer_reviews.title: I have been ripped
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 169 dollar TRX system which is a beginner when the complete system costs 99 dollars. Not a serious company. I expected the full system for that price. No good information for foreigners!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Grobman

customer_reviews.title: Easy for everyone to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Husband loves it. He works out about 30 min a day. Quickly I can see his results. I like it for the low impact on joints.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent total bobal workout
customer_reviews.text: I got introduced to TRX at my local gym. It is an excellent total bobal workout. THis is the exactly same kit that is available at my local gym. Now I have the flexibility of doing the work outs at home, and if I want, I can travel with it too.. Depending on how you want to set it up, you will need to get the TRX X mount or something similar to it to properly mount on the ceiling or a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ikayakbr

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. I was so worried about how secure it would be, and its awesome. The mount fits over the door. So each to put up or take down. And it holds my very overweight body. LOVE LOVE LOVE this system. I have a personal trainer who is teaching me to use it correctly. literally an all in one Gym.
customer_reviews.author: Fos

customer_reviews.title: One of the best quarantine purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to order this because they weren't available but I'm glad I was patient and finally ordered one. It's amazing to have a home workout space with just one piece of equipment. It's easy to set up and take down and really versatile. I'll have one in my home gym all the time now after this!
customer_reviews.author: Honest feedback

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for 5 years and it's still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this thing for years and I LOVE it! If you're looking for an easy system, TRX is it. I've recovered from surgeries while using this. I've been able to tie it to trees, hang it over my door, you name it. I wouldn't spend the money on the bracket because I put up a $5 bracket from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Mom living a good life!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like using this. It's up on a door that swings inside, and I use it outside with the door closed. Versatile options for how to use it depending on what areas need attention/flexibility/strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRX--What a Great Invention
customer_reviews.text: My trainer introduced me to the product, TRX. We use it sometimes at the gym to learn other ways of accomplishing my goals. When I travel or don't want to take time to drive to the gym, I have the system where I can work out at home. It travels with me and replaces trips to the hotel facilities. It works first time and every time; what else could I want.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Forget the gym.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the day before the gyms closed because of COVID-19. This will work every body part you normally relay on for the gym and is so portable. It's sturdy and reliable. Even when the gyms open back up, I'm going to stay home and rely on my TRX. If you're a fitness buff - you need to own one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Z

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and glad I did. This is all you need, not that full package with videos. That's what YouTube is for. Quality gym equipment and can do plenty of workouts with this set. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Body weight training is just wonderful, to begin with. I my much younger years, I was the fitness officer for my Army Reserve unit, and taught classes a t a local gym that emphasized functional training. I am now recovering strength and flexibility at age 76, and the TRX is just what I need. I started using it in physical therapy, and it makes my fitness work fun and effective. I have it over the door, and it is easy to adjust. This is a well designed product, and this is the one to buy. Leave the cheap imitations alone. YOu can wrap this up and take it with you travelling, too. And the teen grandkids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Uckerman

customer_reviews.title: The placing of your feet, that controls the amount of resistance.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of different exercises you can do and the amount of different places you can do them at. Learned how to use the straps in Mexico 4 years ago and I have pretty much given up on weights that I have been doing since 77.
customer_reviews.author: r.j.h

customer_reviews.title: hate going to gym
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far. I just got the anchor you screw into the wall to attach suspension system. I wanted that so I could set it up in garage. I had only used it a few times in my bedroom with piece you put over door and shut so you can workout which worked great, but I don't really want to workout in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Know your limitations
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. Not meant for those with older and weak shoulders. Say hello to old age!! Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mercede Benz of suspension trainers!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a personal trainer and before Covid, I taught group trx classes at my gym and also used the trx with personal clients. I have used knock off suspension trainers as well. The TRX is by far the best product on the market! It's well constructed, easy to use and the online exercise resources are phenomenal! Don't settle for a cheaper version. There's a reason for it's higher price...it's the Mercede Benz of suspension trainers!
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: The best way to have a full workout!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this TRX model and was pleasantly surprised. I have tried many general fitness products over the years, but I think that this one is the best for the money. With the TRX Suspension Trainer, you use your body weight, and can get a full workout as if you went to the gym. I even brought this with me on vacation, and was able to workout in my hotel room - without having to risk using the gym during the pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one of these. Its compact enough for travel and with the door attachment you can do your workout anywhere there is a door. Best buy hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Zaida Cortes

customer_reviews.title: TRX is an excellent work out at home and easy to take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: The Pilates studio I attend has TRX classes, but I haven't been able to join a class. The folks in the TRX class are getting so strong and lean between TRX and Pilates. When Amazon offered a special, I decided to try it for home use. I used it for the first time last night and can wholly endorse it! I use TRX with the door anchor. The instructional video is so helpful. I would be confused without it as a first time TRX user. The quality of the TRX product is excellent too. I'm so glad I bought this - even happier I got it on special!
customer_reviews.author: PYL

customer_reviews.title: Well built but expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: As a piece of equipment I would give it five stars but I have to knock off a star due to the price. Having said that, they are sturdy and now I have something I can take on business trips to use in the hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Squash Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works great on any door without damage
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this, for fear of damaging my home, however, it works great! It is easy to use over a door and there is no reason to worry about damage. It is the same high quality that you will find in gyms with membership fees. I highly recommend this product for your home use.
customer_reviews.author: JayL

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting back in shape
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting back in shape. Used these with the physical therapist after my shoulder was rebuilt. Love this at home. And they are great for use in an apartment as well. You can definitely get a full workout with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for building strength
customer_reviews.text: Have toned and lost weight and gained strength in the past almost 3 months. Wish TRX would redesign the foot cradles to adjust for the smaller female foot. I have to use the handle slot. Tons of online videos, find your favorite! Bought a lug attachment at lowes and attached it to the joists in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: popey07

customer_reviews.title: OTF at Home
customer_reviews.text: I happened to buy these just before Covid-19 shut down the Orange Theory studios. I was fortunate to have them here available at my house for home workouts!
customer_reviews.author: hollandsx4

customer_reviews.title: Great for home follow up of physical therapy exercises
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the TRX. I have used it at physical therapy and find it very helpful to be able to duplicate the exercises at home. It is simple to set up and takes up minimal space. I toss the weighted rectangle over a door, shut the door and it all stays very stable. Looking forward to taking it outside as the weather gets warmer and attaching it to some gym equipment in a neighborhood park.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Im so happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy with this! Picked it up from the Treasure Truck and I have managed to use it almost every day for the last couple of weeks. Already have better definition in my upper arms and my core strength is much better! My gym has a TRX, and its always in use I can never get a good set in! So glad to be able to use this at home now :)
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this at home during COVID and it has been a life saver. I attach it to my front door. It is so versatile and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mariellen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter kit
customer_reviews.text: bought this to use in the house now that it's gotten colder. Everyone in the family can use it and everyone enjoys using it! Got it on a great deal... Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like the one my trainer used with me. Getting good use out of it. Easy to travel with as well. I like the videos it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Elle W

customer_reviews.title: Workout material missing and poor function
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed on the lack of workout material, door set up less than idea and not worth the high cost given the product you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice System - Only 1 Month App Access
customer_reviews.text: Great workout set and the videos are fantastic. A few issues with this set are that you get one year of APP access if you buy from the TRX training store instead of Amazon (1 month) and the APP stops if your phone rings.
customer_reviews.author: RolandTheGunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Great at home equipment
customer_reviews.text: Luv my personal TRX. Started using recently for physical therapy after shoulder surgery. Great to have one at home for my own use. Door mount is great (although I ordered the wall mount just to have some flexibility).
customer_reviews.author: Eatinfool

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or commercial use!
customer_reviews.text: As a certified personal trainer, I find this equipement essential as most of the major gyms carry this, and should too, as an independent contractor. I find that I use it myself also. I purchased this one and the Jungle Gym XT about a year before, but prefer the Jungle Gym XT since it is simpler to set up and user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for home based workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could use it at home on the days I can't get to the gym. The DVD and booklet were very helpful to get me started. And I like it enough that I've been skipping the gym some days just to use the TRX (the one at the gym is always in use). The only downside is that I have to use the door anchor as I have no ceiling mount at home - so the exercises have to be modified a bit to accommodate the door. Overall, I get a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: HCPE

customer_reviews.title: TRX
customer_reviews.text: This simple device provides a wide range of possible workouts. The amount of exercises is limited only by your own creativity. Although entry level efforts are supported: more complex challenges are the forte.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hocking

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to going to the gym
customer_reviews.text: My personal trainer recommended that I get this...and I am so glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym
customer_reviews.text: I set this up in my basement and can easily do my strength training without a gym. I subscribed for trx workouts to teach me routines that are efficient.
customer_reviews.author: PaulG

customer_reviews.title: TRX
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came with the flexible rubber safety straps for people with Mobility issues, to help build strength; that would be the only thing this is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Home workouts -- the best system!
customer_reviews.text: TRX is a quality, sturdy system -- and user-friendly. Excellent booklet instructions accompany the TRX. On-line workouts are provided, and emails come in frequently -- an excellent support system! The best of home equipment!
customer_reviews.author: A. Grady

customer_reviews.title: great workpout
customer_reviews.text: it does not come with motivation.. but is a great addition to the workout and is actually fun once you get motivated..
customer_reviews.author: franb-zgorski

customer_reviews.title: Love TRX!!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of TRX and their proructs! I recommend any daily active person to have this in their home gym, to use at least 4 times a week for 30 min! Great workout!!
customer_reviews.author: TC.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and a high impact workout for a 57 year old male in good shape just want to study that way , workout at home for efficiency’s sake and avoid injury. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John P. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good product to supplement my workouts at home with resistance bands and weights. You can only do so much using the door anchor. Well made but a little pricey compared to knockoffs for half the price. Not sure of competitors quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joeydude

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Have to say my husband is very very satisfied with this product however he has not used it more than once maybe with this review he’ll start using
customer_reviews.author: Donnarose

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you like trx
customer_reviews.text: It’s the real deal trx. It’s a decent addition to my home gym. I enjoy doing suspended mountain climbers, stretching and handstand push-ups with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yong H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: TRX is a great option for at home or on the go workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my home workouts! A little meh about the quality of the grips on these straps compared to the TRX system at my gym at work, but for the price and being portable, I’ll take it. I have recommended the TRX straps to a bunch of my friends from the gym for at home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kahiki

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly what can I say but this is a fantastic product to have. If you like to workout or you are getting into it this is the one thing that you need for anywhere. I bought it because when COVID-19 started my gym closed and I loved using this all the time. But you can truly use this inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. There are tons of excercises to do with this as it's versatile. From hanging on the door or ceiling. Very strong also, there is no fear of straps ripping apart or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one at the gym. So easy to set up and use. VERY professional and whadda price for this awesome system
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: TRX is an amazing full body workout. We tried it one time at the YMCA and my husband and I were hooked! The range of workouts is incredible and the fact that we can use it together is awesome. I would recommend buying two however, so you can workout at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for stretching and strength building.
customer_reviews.text: We have used one in our gym and this is the same one and works perfectly with our workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly and am super happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and am super happy with the quality. Had a cheaper version that fell apart very quickly and made me regret not getting this one in the first place. now I have a great piece of equipment that I know will last through many years of workouts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say - it works great and makes my body hurt. I've been using the door mount on our lightweight closet door and there are no issues. I'm going to mount it to the ceiling on my patio once the weather warms up. I got a 5,000lb truck bed tie-down to hang it from.
customer_reviews.author: idcuda

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: They are in a class by themselves. Was lent a knock off brand. TRX is simply superior in every way. Materials, clips, sewing, handles. There is nothing cheap about this. And, no surprise, it costs more because it warrants it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B.

customer_reviews.title: Best portable training system ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best training system for people with lousy knees and lets me exercise full body and experience no pain in my knees. You can make it as easy or as challenging as you wish and is wonderfully portable. All one needs is a full wood strong door to hang it on. High recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: manthony

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: As described, arrived quickly. Easy setup. Just make certain that if you use over a door, the door is very smooth / without splits or snags.
customer_reviews.author: Poma

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!! This will kick your workout into full gear!
customer_reviews.text: I am a TRX certified trainer and have always wanted one for in home use. My fiancé and I are currently using the over the door strap since we have an apartment and can not screw into the ceiling for a traditional mount. It works fantastic! We are both muscular and need something sturdy to hold us. I absolutely live the versatility this package gave us!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: TRX is a very good training product and with little care will last years and years
customer_reviews.author: TinMan

customer_reviews.title: TRX
customer_reviews.text: I’m hooked on the TRX , I tried it at the gym so I purchase it for my home. Waiting for my husband to hook it up for me
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great for workouts! My daughter has used it to strengthen her leg after ACL surgery. My only complaint is that I could have done without the door adapter- it is too much strain on my indoor doors. We use it on a tree in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great home workout!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and was surprised how easy it is to use. I would recommend anyone buy this that can’t get to the gym and likes to work out at home. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ray

product_meta.title: TRX ALL-IN-ONE Suspension Training: Bodyweight Resistance System | Full Body Workouts for Home, Travel, and Outdoors | Build Muscle, Burn Fat, Improve Cardio | Free Workouts Included
feature_bullets: OUR BEST-SELLING TRAINING SYSTEM! Create full-body workouts Anywhere, Anytime! Includes Suspension Training Strap, Indoor/Outdoor Anchors, 35-Page Workout Guide & 2 Bonus Workouts,PLUS get your FREE 30 Day Trial on our NEW TRX App to Generate Next-Level Intensity NOW!

GET AMAZING RESULTS FAST! For ALL Skill Levels, ALL Health & Fitness Goals! Digital Workouts teach you to rapidly achieve incredible results: Build Muscle, Burn Fat, Strengthen Core, Increase Endurance & Improve Flexibility to Look & Feel Your Best!

MOVEMENT-BASED TRAINING is the Cornerstone of TRX’s Training Philosophy. Practice, Refine & Master 7 Simple Foundational Moves: Push, Pull, Plank, Squat, Lunge, Hinge & Rotate. Develop limitless variations while Progressing at Your Own Speed!

WORKOUT ANYWHERE! TRX easily anchors to doors, rafters or beams at home OR anywhere outdoors to trees, poles or posts! Weighing roughly 1 pound, TRX Travels Light & Fast—and has even been Safety-Tested to Support Up To 350 Pounds of Resistance!
INCLUDES 6-MONTHS ACCESS TO TRX PREMIUM APP: Enjoy 6-Months of free access to the TRX premium app ($30 value) where you can explore over 1,000 workouts on your way to achieving your fitness goals.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
